title: Ceiling fan, Controlled access, Range, Internet cafe
posting_body: ['We are currently offering virtual tours.', 'Please use the link in this ad to visit our website and set up a tour today or give us a call!', 'Welcome to Charles River Landing', 'Call Now - (781) 676-3171 x 4', 'This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 1588 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Charles River Landing boasts remarkable amenities and luxury apartments in Needham, Massachusetts.', 'Take advantage of private courtyards with resort-style pool and outdoor fireplace, controlled-access private garage, fitness center, and HDTV sports lounge complete with billiards.', 'Now offering furnished and unfurnished apartments, these Needham apartments feature spacious master suites with oversized closets, hardwood and travertine flooring, high ceilings, full-sized washer/dryer, and a gourmet kitchen complete with granite countertops and stainless steel appliances.', 'Enjoy stylish details, high ceilings, and custom color accent walls in addition to premier resident services.', 'Located on the bank of the Charles River in the New England Business Center, Charles River Landing boasts an ideal location with easy access to the scenic waterfront as well as I-95 and the Mass Pike.', 'We are currently offering self-guided tours.', 'Features:', 'Computer niche, Private balcony, Painted accent walls, Study, Private patio, Dishwasher, Washer and dryer, Gourmet kitchen, Built-in bookshelves, Climate control, Marble countertops, Refrigerator, Stainless steel appliances, Disposal, Granite countertops, Walk-in closets, Garden tub, Ceiling fan, Self-cleaning oven, Range, Microwave, Dry bar', '*Not all amenities available for every floor plan', 'Community Amenities:', 'Spin studio, Smart home package, Elevator, Dual vanity, Complimentary Wi-Fi, Private outdoor living space, Soaking tub, Quartz counters, Courtyards w/outdoor fireplaces, Ceiling fan, Built-in desk, Walk-in closet, Den/ office, Swimming pool, Stand-alone shower, Guest parking, Clubhouse, Business center, Stainless steel appliances, Internet cafe, Deposit free with Rhino, Furnished apartments available, Pantry, Short term leases available, Tile floors in bathroom, Built-in bookcase, Coffee and tea bar, Washer and dryer, Additional reserved garage and outdoor parking, Resident grilling area, Resident app, Tile backsplash, Controlled access, Granite countertops, Pet friendly, Additional storage, Fitness center, Build credit score with RentTrack, 24-hour package lockers, Moving services with Move Matcher, Nest thermostat, Hardwood floors, Recreation room', 'Pet Policy', 'Pet friendly - A Wag!
